events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I've changed my mind and would like to get a refund. Please let me know the process.
The customer's request about returning the jacket and getting money back has been categorized as Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., specializing in refund requests for apparel orders.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order refund. I'm here to help you through the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request to proceed with your case?
Sure, my order number is 9988776655. I want a refund because the jacket doesn't fit and I won't be needing an exchange.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days using the prepaid shipping label that I'll email you shortly to get a full refund.
Thanks for the quick reply and the prepaid label. That sounds easy and convenient. I appreciate your help!
The refund process has been successfully set up, and the customer has the return label to send the jacket back.
We are checking in to ensure you have received your refund after returning the jacket and to confirm everything went smoothly.
The refund case has been closed as the customer confirmed the refund was received and no further assistance is needed.
